meta.description: XEN.fyi is an open-source project to help users understand the XEN crypto protocol and its ecosystem.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.amp-description: Reward Amplifier (AMP) is a time-dependent part of FREN Mint Reward calculation. It starts at 3,000 at Genesis and decreases by 1 every day until it reaches 1
dashboard.eaa-description: Early Adopter Amplifier (EAA) is a part of FREN Mint Reward calculation which depends on current Global Rank. EAA starts from 10% and decreases in a linear fashion by 0.1% per each 100,000 increase in Global Rank.
dashboard.apy-description: Annual Percentage Yield (APY) determines FREN Staking Reward calculation. It is non-compounding and is pro-rated by days. APY starts at 20% on Genesis and decreases by 1p.p. every 90 days until it reaches 2%

mint.title: Mint
mint.terms-details: Your mint starts by claiming a rank. Select the number of days you want to mint for. The longer you mint for, the more rewards you will receive. You can mint for a maximum of {{numberOfDays}} days.

stake.title: Stake
stake.terms-details: Withdraw original stake amount plus yield at any time after the maturity date, or at any time the original stake amount with 0 (zero) yield before the maturity date. One stake at a time per one address
stake.note-description: Your stake term is not over yet. You can end your stake early without a penalty without you yield or you can wait until your stake matures to get the full yield.

batch.title: Batch
batch.quantity-positive: Quantity of batch-mint must be greater than 0

ethf.tip: A fork of Ethereum that keeps POW. Anyone can participate without restrictions

fczz.tip: CZZ is the first public chain to realize decentralized cross-chain transaction.

fren.tip:
Designed to allow creation of innovative 
 structured and collateralized spot and option products by POWP(Proof of 
 Work and Proof of Participation)

direct.title: Holding Swap
direct.tip: Holders of Pre-Fren can directly swap their FrenV1 to new $fren at here, and the quantity is counted until block height 16807817.

staking.title: Staking Swap
staking.tip: Stakers of Pre-Fren could confirm their amount of staking and expired date to claim, and the quantity is counted until block height 16807817.

mining.title: Mining Swap
mining.tip: Mining of Pre-Fren could confirm their amount of staking and expired date to claim, and the quantity is counted until block height 16807817.

upgrade.title: About FREN Upgrade
upgrade.content: Fren's upgrade has been completely redesigned, including the introduction of a time model, a significant reduction in production and inflation, and more future empowerment for Fren. Fren Labs has completed the snapshot for existing holding, minting, and staking users at block height 16807817. We will soon launch a coin swap function, details as follows:

items.it1: Existing direct holding users can directly swap old $Fren for new $Fren at a 1:1 ratio by burning their old $Fren and receiving the same amount of new $Fren.
items.it2: Existing staking users can claim new $Fren at a 1:1 ratio based on the original staking algorithm and parameters of old $Fren at the expiration date of their staking.
items.it3: Existing minting users can claim new $Fren at a 1:1 ratio based on the original minting algorithm and parameters of old $Fren at the expiration date of their minting.
